      • check

        public boolean check(int i)
        Method to checks if a pixel is between 0 and 255
        Parameters:
        i - Pixel value.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the pixel is between 0 and 255 and false, otherwise.

      • checkMatrix

        public boolean checkMatrix(int[][] A)
        Method to check if all the pixels are between 0 and 255
        Parameters:
        A - Image matrix.
        Returns:
        True if the image is already normalized.

      • rgb

        Returns:
